website_summaries.verdict: These costumes are durable, comfortable, and easy to accessorize with crowns or scepters to take it to the next level.
pros: Good quality fabric, and nice colors
One king card tunic, and one queen card tunic
Constructed from a 100% polyester flexible foam
Fits men up to 6 feet tall and 200 pounds
cons: Some buyers said they received costumes that look like they had been used
Some received 2 of the same costume (two queens)

customer_reviews.title: Very Very PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! My husband and I are between 201 and 219 lbs and these fit Perfectly! They were also comfortable to move around in and sit. Material: Foam of some sort
customer_reviews.author: Rayn Newson

customer_reviews.title: I'm excited to wear it.
customer_reviews.text: This costume fit us just a little big but still comfortably. I am 5'6 and my husband is 6ft. The picture has good color and it seems like it'll last a very long time. The quality is very good. It's thick and keeps its shape even while wearing it. It's not at all flimsy and cheap like I've seen before.
customer_reviews.author: Maacje

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: It was a little smaller than we were expecting but they still fit pretty good. My husband and I found this costume at a costume shop for about three times the price so I was really happy when I found it online. We worn this costume for like 2-3 Halloweens. We're even going to a Halloween horror convention next year and we may wear this as part of our con costume.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra dohm

customer_reviews.title: Great Couples Costume!
customer_reviews.text: We're so excited about our costumes for an upcoming Halloween event! We were a little concerned about fit -- that they might be too small. My boyfriend's fit perfectly -- mine is somewhat larger than I thought it might be, but we love it. VERY affordable and somewhat unique. Just what we were looking for. We also got a couple of accessories (crown & tiara) to complete the look.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Eifler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! If you want an easy, nice looking couple costume at a great price. Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! Simple costume that really looked great! Added a few accessories and it was a hit! Easiest costume I have ever worn! Flexible material so not awkward to move and not HUGE so I wasn't knocking into everything!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Costumes looked GREAT and were very inexpensive for two costumes. I added a lot of my own props to expand on it. (Crowns, red wigs, skeleton masks, etc to make us match the cards .). So the cheap costume became a bit more expensive. But well worth it!! It looked great! Won Scariest costume at work!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT FOR ALL SIZES
customer_reviews.text: We wore these costumes for a Halloween party! We loved them! Received alot of compliments. Quality is thick and nice for the affordable price. I'm between a size 14 and 16 in ladies, this costume was perftect, not snug at all, had plenty of room. I recommend buying these, great price, comfortable and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquetta C.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, easy and affordable !!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and easy ! Super affordable and easy for a last minute costume . I am not tall and it still looked cute . Received so many compliments !!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Robles

customer_reviews.title: Fun costumes but we made up our faces on skull ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun costumes but we made up our faces in skull paint and wore wigs and crowns to be like the king and queen as on the cards.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect couples costume
customer_reviews.text: Great costume great quality. Won best couple with this costume
customer_reviews.author: Patricia DP

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and looks!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compliments on these costumes and very easy to get in and out of! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Feet

customer_reviews.title: great costumes
customer_reviews.text: These costumes were really great. They were very comfortable and we got a lot of compliments. We painted our faces as skeletons and wore crowns.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, easy to utilize and a fan favorite. Colors are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Good costume and very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Easy to add details to costume to finish the look.
customer_reviews.author: Consuella

customer_reviews.title: One size fits all...great costume!
customer_reviews.text: As described...loved wearing the costume with leggings (husband wore jeans) and then bought a crown! Waalaa...Halloween costume!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This costume was fast and easy to put together. The durable quality made it through a great night of fun. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Cute costumes!
customer_reviews.text: Cute costumes with lots of compliments! I suggest hanging up for several days before using due to the fold lines in the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Bar & Nik Tilly

customer_reviews.title: Was better then perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was very surprise to see how well made the custom was it fit well, was not flimsy or cheap looking, it was worn at a Halloween party and received complements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We looked great ;)
customer_reviews.text: It was great...pretty boxy and not form fitting for women but it is a card so 🤷‍♀️ we jazzed it up with a couple accessories and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Charmel Morelli

customer_reviews.title: Good design but large in size
customer_reviews.text: The design is nice but the size is way too big. It covers whole body and it's hard to walk with this on.
customer_reviews.author: Ankur

customer_reviews.title: Cute and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute, inexpensive costume. They do seem to run large. Easy to sit in and drive in.
customer_reviews.author: peggy p

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I was expecting, I really like them!!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Penalba

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fits all.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and skull faces add a little Halloween flare 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Woth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good not just inexpensive. It came fast and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hayward

customer_reviews.title: It was not what I expected and looked like he had been used
customer_reviews.text: It was not what I expected and looked like he had been used...but we had to make it work because we had an event to attend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: WE RECEIVED 2 QUEENS INSTEAD OF A KING AND QUEEN
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the couple that don't want to over do it
customer_reviews.author: James Thompson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Have costume where's the party?
customer_reviews.text: I really like this couples costume. It is made of foam and very flexible. The man's costume fit my hubby and he is 5'7" and 205 lbs. The woman's costume fit me and I'm 5'3" and 154 lbs. I haven't actually had it on for an extended.time but I had it on for about 1/2 hour and sat in it and it was comfortable. The costume does not come with the shirts, pants or shoes. I bought (on Amazon of course)a crown to blend with it and it kind of added a nice final touch. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen clarke

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Durable and comfortable. I'm 6'1" weighing 235 lb and the king fit me fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rob O.

product_meta.title: Fun World King & Queen of Hearts Costume for Adults
